title: [K-12] Science Theory-based Mobile Microlearning Design System

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: A microlearning course systematically applying various scientific theories using an ontology-engineering-based learning design system

learning_goals: Learners must be able to apply basic science theories (e.g., physics laws, chemical reactions) with over 80% accuracy in a mobile environment
Learners must be able to explain associations between at least three science theories using ontology-based design tools
Learners achieve 70 points or higher (out of 100) on a summative assessment after weekly intensive learning
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
